contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Relative Ways | Type = EP | Artist = [[...And You Will Know Us by the Trail of Dead]] | Cover = Relativewayep.jpg | Released = November 6, 2001 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Post-hardcore]] | Length = 15:03 | Label = [[Interscope Records|Interscope]] | Producer = ...And You Will Know Us by the Trail of Dead | Last album = [[Madonna (Trail of Dead album)|''Madonna'']]<br />(1999) | This album = "Relative Ways EP"<br />(2001) | Next album = "[[Source Tags & Codes]]"<br />(2002) }} {{Album ratings |rev1=[[Allmusic]] |rev1Score={{Rating|3|5}} [{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r562106|pure_url=yes}} link] |rev2=Almost Cool |rev2Score=(7/10) [http://www.almostcool.org/mr/38/ link] |rev3=[[Drowned in Sound]] |rev3Score=(6/10) [http://drownedinsound.com/releases/5561/reviews/4636- link] |rev4=[[Pitchfork Media]] |rev4Score=(8.6/10) [http://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/180-relative-ways-ep/ link] }} '''''Relative Ways''''' is an [[Extended play|EP]] released by the band [[...And You Will Know Us by the Trail of Dead]] for [[Interscope Records]]. The 4-song [[Extended play|EP]] was released in late 2001, setting the stage for the early 2002 release of their first [[record label|major-label]] full-length ''[[Source Tags & Codes]]''. ==Track listings== {{tracklist |title1= Relative Ways |length1= 4:43 |title2= Homage |length2= 3:31 |title3= Blood Rites |length3= 1:58 |title4= The Blade Runner |length4= 4:51 }} ==External links== * [http://www.trailofdead.com Trail of Dead Official Site] * [http://www.trailofdead.org Trail of Dead Fansite] {{Trail of Dead}} [[Category:...And You Will Know Us by the Trail of Dead albums]] [[Category:Interscope Records EPs]] [[Category:2001 EPs]] {{2000s-rock-song-stub}}
